Reviews.Title: So Far, So Good
Reviews.Author: Mr. Timothy L. Davis "Tim"
Reviews.Content: I'm using this with a SIM card from the Straight-Talk wireless network.  It took me a few hours to understand how to set this phone up with the Straight-Talk carrier, but I now have a really fast (4G compared to my old 1440baud 3G) service on the Straight Talk network for only $45 a month.  Unlimited everything and a 4" screen to boot.  This beats my old Android by leaps and bounds.  I also learned that if you buy an International unlocked HTC Sensation it will set up a little easier.  Transferring contacts and the like was a breeze.
